code.google.facebook4gwt
Class APIClient

java.lang.Object
  code.google.facebook4gwt.APIClient

public class APIClient
extends java.lang.Object

This is a GWT wrapper for the standard Facebook API. (NOTE: do not use this in server-side code.) This class can only be accessed through Facebook.APIClient().

To read more about the Facebook API that we're wrapping see:

  • http://wiki. developers.facebook.com/index.php/API - The core API documentation
  • http://wiki.developers.facebook.com/index.php/JS_API_T_FB.ApiClient - The JavaScript API client that we are actually wrapping.

Author:
David Wolverton

users_getLoggedInUser

public void users_getLoggedInUser(com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback<FacebookUser> callback,
                                  UserField... fields)

Get information about the currently logged in user. Use the fields params to specify what information you will need.

This is an asynchronous call. The results will be returned to the callback.
